response.original_title: ساعة في الجحيم hour in hell
response.overview: "ساعة في الجحيم" (An Hour in Hell) is a Moroccan TV show about mystery and suspense. It tells the story of people in tough and dangerous situations. The show talks about betrayal, justice, and survival. It has many surprises and keeps viewers interested. It also shows some parts of Moroccan culture and life. It’s an exciting series that makes you think about the choices people make.
response.title: ساعة في الجحيم hour in hell
